project.description: U5-miljøet blir benyttet til å kjøre automatiske tester for 2015HL1-kodestrømmen. Jobben kjøres automatisk hver natt rundt kl 04.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /var/lib/jenkins/svn-repos/TRUNK/maven-wpsdeploy-ci-pom #svn up --username svnguest --password Subversion01 svn up mvn3 clean deploy -e -X -Denvironment=U4 -DfasitUsername=admin -DfasitPasswordBase64=YWRtaW4= -Dbus-configuration-version=0.0.2015.1-SNAPSHOT -Dnav-modules-version=0.0.2015.1-SNAPSHOT -Dpensjon-modules-version=0.0.2015.1-SNAPSHOT -Dekstern-modules-version=0.0.2015.1-SNAPSHOT -Desb-modules-version=0.0.2015.1-SNAPSHOT -DinteractiveMode=false -Dskip=backup-config,create-BLA-groups,bounce-dmgr -Desb-authorization-configuration=0.0.2015.1-SNAPSHOT -Desb-nonenviroment-configuration=0.0.2015.1-SNAPSHOT -Desb-enviroment-configuration=0.0.2015.1-SNAPSHOT -Dlogging.level=DEBUG
